---
category: news
title: "VEViD: a vision enhancement algorithm based on physics"
excerpt: "Optical physics offers blueprints for designing computational imaging algorithms. Inspired by success of fast spectroscopy utilizing coherent photonic time stretch, Vision Enhancement via Virtual-diffraction and coherent Detection (VEViD) reimagines a digital image as a spatially varying metaphoric “light field” that is nonlinearly transformed by propagation through an optical medium."
